(a) a {@filter martial weapon|items|source=phb|category=basic|type=martial weapon} and a {@item shield|phb} or (b) two {@filter martial weapons|items|source=phb|category=basic|type=martial weapon}

classFeature.name: No Equipment
entries: From 1st level, the sidekick has no ability to wear any equipment beyond their starting items. In exchange, they receive bonuses to their stats based on the Attack Roll/Armour, Max HP, and Damage bonus columns of the Sidekick table.

classFeature.name: No Feats
entries: At 1st level, the sidekick gains no feats. Instead, it gains 4 points to distribute between its ability scores. The sidekick cannot increase an ability score above 20 with this feature.

classFeature.name: Passive Regeneration (double prof)
entries: Also from 1st level, the sidekick heals a number of hit points equal to double their proficiency bonus at the start of each of their turns in combat.

classFeature.name: Danger Sense
entries: Beginning at 2nd level, reflex attacks made against the sidekick by effects they can see, such as traps and spells, have disadvantage.

classFeature.name: Improved Critical (+1)
entries: Starting at 3rd level, the sidekick's critical hit range increases by 1.

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: At 4th level, the sidekick has 3 points to distribute amongst their ability scores. The sidekick can't increase an ability score above 20 using this feature.

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: At 6th level, the sidekick increases one ability score of their choice by 2, or the sidekick increases two ability scores of their choice by 1 each. The sidekick can't increase an ability score above 20 using this feature.

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: At 8th level, the sidekick increases one ability score of their choice by 2, or the sidekick increases two ability scores of their choice by 1 each. The sidekick can't increase an ability score above 20 using this feature.

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: At 12th level, the sidekick increases one ability score of their choice by 2, or the sidekick increases two ability scores of their choice by 1 each. The sidekick can't increase an ability score above 20 using this feature.

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: At 14th level, the sidekick increases one ability score of their choice by 2, or the sidekick increases two ability scores of their choice by 1 each. The sidekick can't increase an ability score above 20 using this feature.

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: At 16th level, the sidekick increases one ability score of their choice by 2, or the sidekick increases two ability scores of their choice by 1 each. The sidekick can't increase an ability score above 20 using this feature.

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: At 19th level, the sidekick increases one ability score of their choice by 2, or the sidekick increases two ability scores of their choice by 1 each. The sidekick can't increase an ability score above 20 using this feature.

classFeature.name: Empowered Attack (1)
entries: Beginning at 5th level, when the sidekick uses the Attack action, their main hand weapon's base damage is doubled. For example, a weapon with a damage of {@dice 1d6} + their Strength modifier deals {@dice 2d6} + double their Strength modifier instead.

classFeature.name: Battle Readiness
entries: After the sidekick reaches 7th level, it has advantage on initiative rolls.

classFeature.name: Improved Defences (+1)
entries: From 9th level, the sidekick gains a +1 bonus to fortitude, reflex, and will.

classFeature.name: Improved Armour
entries: At 10th level, the sidekick's armour increases by 1.

classFeature.name: Empowered Attack (2)
entries: From 11th level, when the sidekick uses the Attack action, their main hand weapon's base damage is tripled. For example, a weapon with a damage of {@dice 1d6} + their Strength modifier deals {@dice 3d6} + triple their Strength modifier instead.

classFeature.name: Improved Defences (+2)
entries: From 13th level, the sidekick gains a further +1 bonus (for a total of +2) to fortitude, reflex, and will.

classFeature.name: Improved Critical (+2)
entries: Starting at 15th level, the sidekick's critical hit range increases by a further 1 (for a total of +2).

classFeature.name: Improved Defences (+3)
entries: From 17th level, the sidekick gains a further +1 bonus (for a total of +3) to fortitude, reflex, and will.

classFeature.name: Passive Regeneration (level)
entries: From 18th level, the number of hit points the sidekick heals at the start of each of their turns in combat increases to their level.

classFeature.name: Empowered Attack (3)
entries: At 20th level, when the sidekick uses the Attack action, their main hand weapon's base damage is quadrupled. For example, a weapon with a damage of {@dice 1d6} + their Strength modifier deals {@dice 4d6} + quadruple their Strength modifier instead.
